snippet: Stefan Herheim’s production of Dvorak’s “Rusalka,” at the Théâtre Royal de la Monnaie in Brussels, is confusing and demanding, but also bewitching.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Stefan Herheim production of Dvorak opera Rusalka at the Theatre Royal de la Monnaie in Brussels.
lead_paragraph: Stefan Herheim’s production of Dvorak’s “Rusalka,” at the Théâtre Royal de la Monnaie in Brussels, is confusing and demanding, but also bewitching.
